author: samwilsn
content:
Spec Sync #41
 - <@!689161464829050960> besides review, not much on the specs.
 - <@!243183686562873344> put up the ECC pre-compiles (docs broken, sam to fix); now working on exception reform. Made a patch to port changes between hard forks.
 - <@!564718359304863744> found an interesting test case for the ECC pre-compiles
 - <@!830368514225340436> implementing Constantinople EIPs. Looking at an EVM trace implementation.
 - <@!497280885645639691> `CREATE2` implementation
